requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Sandy Bridge or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2080 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
